description:
Teachers do you...

Not have a enough time for planning?

Not have a enough time for grading?

Spend hours chasing down parents on the phone?

Spend hours putting make-up work packets together for absent students?

Need more ways to offer differentiated instruction?

Need more ways to offer remediation?

Save time with a teacher website. Learn step by step how to create a self hosted site. Learn how to create pages, post, add images and videos.

Learn how to create self grading quizzes that you can grade in minutes and use to gather data.

You will learn how to create a make up work blog students can access anytime anywhere!

It's time to work smarter not harder.

Enroll today!
title: SAVE TIME Planning and Grading With a Teacher Website
